fileHistoryVSX.openai.apiKey.description: API key for OpenAI compatible service
fileHistoryVSX.openai.apiKey.markdownDescription: API key for OpenAI compatible service. Can be left empty if using environment variables.

fileHistoryVSX.openai.baseUrl.description: Base URL for OpenAI compatible API
fileHistoryVSX.openai.baseUrl.markdownDescription: Base URL for OpenAI compatible API. Default is OpenAI's official endpoint.

fileHistoryVSX.openai.model.description: Model name to use for API calls
fileHistoryVSX.openai.model.markdownDescription: Model name to use for API calls (e.g., gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4, claude-3-sonnet-20240229).

fileHistoryVSX.openai.maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate
fileHistoryVSX.openai.maxTokens.markdownDescription: Maximum number of tokens to generate in API responses.

fileHistoryVSX.openai.temperature.markdownDescription: Controls randomness in API responses. Lower values make output more focused and deterministic.

fileHistoryVSX.git.issueReferencePattern.description: Regular expression patterns for extracting issue/ticket references from commit messages
fileHistoryVSX.git.issueReferencePattern.markdownDescription: Array of regular expression patterns used to extract issue, PR, and ticket references from commit messages. Supports GitHub (#123), Azure DevOps (AB#123), GitLab (!123), JIRA (ABC-123), and generic patterns (fixes #123).
